statements: SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE role_id > 3;
SELECT description, role_id FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%User%';
SELECT role_id, role_name, description FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT role_id, role_name, description FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id > 2 ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE description LIKE '%Manager%' ORDER BY role_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_roles FROM roles;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, role FROM employees WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, role FROM employees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, role FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM access_logs ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, role FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE employee_id = 3 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM employees WHERE id < 5;
SELECT name, log_message FROM employees JOIN access_logs ON employees.id = access_logs.employee_id WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT data_content FROM sensitive_data WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT data_id, data_content, username FROM sensitive_data JOIN users ON sensitive_data.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role_id = 1 AND username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT data_content FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND user_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT users.username, sensitive_data.data_content FROM users INNER JOIN sensitive_data ON users.user_id = sensitive_data.user_id WHERE users.role_id = 2;
SELECT roles.role_name AS Role, COUNT(users.user_id) AS User_Count FROM roles LEFT JOIN users ON roles.role_id = users.role_id GROUP BY roles.role_name ORDER BY User_Count DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees ORDER BY last_name
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, role FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager'
SELECT * FROM roles INNER JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id
SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM roles JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, role FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;

SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM roles INNER JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id INNER JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE role = 'Manager' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT role, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees GROUP BY role;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_id > 5 ORDER BY role_name DESC;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id JOIN permissions p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
